DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy ondansetron compare placebo treatment cocaine dependence .
DOC.detailed_description: We propose conduct 9 week randomize , control clinical trial evaluate efficacy ondansetron 4 mg twice daily compare placebo ( total N = 100/group Ã— 2 group = 200 individual randomize , 400 total subject consent ) , provide adjunct manual-driven , structured CBT + BBCET treatment cocaine dependence .
DOC.criteria: Males female give write informed consent . Ages 18 year , must weigh least 40 Kg 140 Kg . Good physical health determine complete physical examination , EKG within normal limit , laboratory screening test within acceptable parameter . Current DSMIV diagnosis cocaine dependence . At least one positive urine drug screen cocaine screen baseline prior randomization . The pregnancy test female intake must negative . Literacy English ability read , understand , complete rating scale questionnaire accurately , follow instruction , make use behavioral treatment .
